name: Hagar's Well Ministries
description: Hagar's Well Inc. is a faith-based transitional living facility established in 2022 in London, Kentucky, offering safe and affordable housing along with recovery-focused transitional care for women. As a Nar Level 2 facility, they serve female opioid overdose survivors, pregnant women with opioid use disorder (OUD), women with co-occurring mental health and substance use disorders, and females seeking transitional housing post-residential treatment or medical detox. The organization provides a supportive family-like environment for women in recovery to live together successfully, with rehabilitation and reintegration programs aimed at community reintegration and a drug-free lifestyle.
source: Verified from official Hagar's Well website and multiple online directories
services: Transitional housing for women in recovery, faith-based recovery support, workforce development, rehabilitation programs, substance abuse recovery
eligibility: Women seeking recovery from addiction, female opioid overdose survivors, pregnant women with OUD, women with co-occurring disorders
notes: Contact person: Ashley Wagers (606-493-9638). The facility is located at Grace Abounding Full Gospel Missions and provides a 9-12 month program with a maximum stay of 2 years. Their faith-based approach fosters strength, fellowship, and encouragement, equipping residents for self-sufficiency in their recovery journey.
